fullText: Douglas Lyons's family comedy 'Chicken & Biscuits' is a warmhearted but uneven Broadway debut that relies heavily on familiar sitcom beats.
dtliExcerpt: Douglas Lyons's family comedy 'Chicken & Biscuits' is a warmhearted but uneven Broadway debut that relies heavily on familiar sitcom beats.
